payload.description: Concourse is a container-based continuous thing-doer written in Go.

release.name: v6.8.0
release.body:
## 🚨 Breaking

- If `guardian` runtime is enabled in your Concourse deployment, do not upgrade to this version as the latest library of `guardian` has backward compatibility [issue](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/garden-runc-release/issues/233) that might not work in Ubuntu 18.04 or 20.04. 


## ✈️ Features

* Bump dependencies for worker runtime to support Ubuntu Jammy Jellyfish by @xtremerui in https://github.com/concourse/concourse/pull/8609
  * Noted, `guardian` runtime is still under development to fully [support Ubuntu Jammy](https://github.com/cloudfoundry/guardian/issues/301). In fact, it does not work on any linux distribution with `cgroups v2` enabled. We decided to bump the dependencies still for users who want to use latest linux distribution and willing to tweak their OS to enable `cgroups v1`.




## 🤷 Miscellaneous

* Fix container memory limit tests in integration by @xtremerui in https://github.com/concourse/concourse/pull/8611
* Add buildvcs=false to `go build` in integration tests by @xtremerui in https://github.com/concourse/concourse/pull/8612  


## 📦 Bundled resource types

<details>

- bosh-io-release: [v1.0.5](https://github.com/concourse/bosh-io-release-resource/releases/tag/v1.0.5)
- bosh-io-stemcell: [v1.0.5](https://github.com/concourse/bosh-io-stemcell-resource/releases/tag/v1.0.5)
- cf: [v1.1.4](https://github.com/concourse/cf-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.4)
- docker-image: [v1.5.5](https://github.com/concourse/docker-image-resource/releases/tag/v1.5.5)
- git: [v1.12.3](https://github.com/concourse/git-resource/releases/tag/v1.12.3)
- github-release: [v1.5.5](https://github.com/concourse/github-release-resource/releases/tag/v1.5.5)
- hg: [v1.2.7](https://github.com/concourse/hg-resource/releases/tag/v1.2.7)
- mock: [v0.11.3](https://github.com/concourse/mock-resource/releases/tag/v0.11.3)
- pool: [v1.1.7](https://github.com/concourse/pool-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.7)
- registry-image: [v0.14.2](https://github.com/concourse/registry-image-resource/releases/tag/v0.14.2)
- s3: [v1.1.3](https://github.com/concourse/s3-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.3)
- semver: [v1.2.3](https://github.com/concourse/semver-resource/releases/tag/v1.2.3)
- time: [v1.4.1](https://github.com/concourse/time-resource/releases/tag/v1.4.1)
- tracker: [v1.0.8](https://github.com/concourse/tracker-resource/releases/tag/v1.0.8)
</details>
release.short_description_html:
🚨 Breaking

  • If guardian runtime is enabled in your Concourse deployment, do not upgrade to this version as the latest library of guardian has backward compatibility issue that might not work in Ubu…

release.name: v7.8.3
release.body:
#### :link: security * Fix team name overwritten bug * All Concourse versions prior to v7.8.3 is vulnerable to parameter pollution that allows authorization bypass in functionality that is meant to restrict cross team actions. An user in any team could make certain http requests to trigger unauthorized activity for other teams like pausing pipelines, re-triggering builds or exposing pipelines. (#8580 ) * Bump Dex to v2.35.1 for [CVE-2022-39222](https://github.com/dexidp/dex/security/advisories/GHSA-vh7g-p26c-j2cw). (#8579 ) ## 📦 Bundled resource types
- bosh-io-release: [v1.1.3](https://github.com/concourse/bosh-io-release-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.3) - bosh-io-stemcell: [v1.1.2](https://github.com/concourse/bosh-io-stemcell-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.2) - cf: [v1.1.4](https://github.com/concourse/cf-resource/releases/tag/v1.1.4) - docker-image: [v1.6.3](https://github.com/concourse/docker-image-resource/releases/tag/v1.6.3) - git: [v1.14.5](https://github.com/concourse/git-resource/releases/tag/v1.14.5) - github-release: [v1.7.2](https://github.com/concourse/github-release-resource/releases/tag/v1.7.2) - hg: [v1.2.7](https://github.com/concourse/hg-resource/releases/tag/v1.2.7) - mock: [v0.12.4](https://github.com/concourse/mock-resource/releases/tag/v0.12.4) - pool: [v1.3.0](https://github.com/concourse/pool-resource/releases/tag/v1.3.0) - registry-image: [v1.5.1](https://github.com/concourse/registry-image-resource/releases/tag/v1.5.1) - s3: [v1.2.1](https://github.com/concourse/s3-resource/releases/tag/v1.2.1) - semver: [v1.4.0](https://github.com/concourse/semver-resource/releases/tag/v1.4.0) - time: [v1.6.3](https://github.com/concourse/time-resource/releases/tag/v1.6.3) - tracker: [v1.0.8](https://github.com/concourse/tracker-resource/releases/tag/v1.0.8)
release.short_description_html:
🔗 security

  • Fix team name overwritten bug

    • All Concourse versions prior to v7.8.3 is vulnerable to parameter pollution that allows authorization bypass in functionality that is meant to restrict c…
